MS MCQs

    Trigger an Azure Event Grid workflow from an IoT device - Summary

    »

    1. If I want to use Event Grid in my application, I need to deploy an instance of the Azure Event Grid service in my subscription.

      False

      True


    2. Azure IoT Hub can publish only events related to device life cycle.

      True

      False


    3. Azure IoT Hub event types are prefixed with:

      Microsoft.Devices

      Microsoft.IoT

      Microsoft.IoTHub

      Microsoft.IoT.Devices


    4. When filtering events before they are sent to Event Grid, you can filter on the following elements:

      Event type, telemetry, device ID

      Event type, IoT hub name, device ID

      Event type, IoT hub name, telemetry, device ID
